verbs.description: [ARG0: iowa father] [V: takes] [ARG1: stand] blames mother for baby death an iowa father on trial for the gruesome death of his infant son blamed the baby mother from the stand friday zachary paul koehn 29 said under questioning from his attorney that he had entrusted care of 4-month - old sterling koehn to the baby mother the courier reported i put my trust in the wrong person koehn said repeatedly he also pointed to the 70 to 80 hours a week he worked as a truck driver while the baby mother cheyanne harris did not work outside the home death iowa zachary paul koehn mother cheyanne harris
